translations.Quickly share text or files by dropping: Shiriki maandishi au faili kwa haraka kwa kuzidondosha kwenye Nextcloud yako!
translations.Just drop text and data quickly to your: Dondosha tu maandishi na data kwa Nextcloud yako. Kwa nyakati hizo unataka tu kushiriki faili lakini hujali mahali pa kuihifadhi.
translations.Drop your file here to generate a link: Dondosha faili yako hapa kuzalisha kiungo
